name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The difference between China's high school "Politics and Ideology" textbooks and Taiwan's high school "Citizenship and Society" textbooks: China's textbooks constantly emphasize the legitimacy of the Communist Party and Xi Jinping's rule, while Taiwan's textbooks are aimed at actively cultivating students' civic awareness.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: For more comparisons, please watch "Xi Jinping Thought Enters Campus: Chinese Ideological and Political Courses VS Taiwan Citizenship Courses, the Differences between Citizenship Education on Both Sides of the Taiwan Strait"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, the super typhoon "Makar" made landfall in Hainan, sweeping through everything it passed with overwhelming force. Balcony windows of high-rise residents were blown away by the wind, and passers-by were blown to the ground. It is reported that Typhoon "Makar" has caused 3 deaths and 95 injuries in Hainan, Guangdong and Guangxi.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, a group chat record circulated online showed that a leader of the Leizhou Agriculture and Rural Bureau notified the grassroots to go to the disaster area to count the losses of fishing boats and fishing ports caused by the typhoon. However, the subordinates chose to confront the leader, saying that the grassroots cadres were all in the village to resist the wind, and the wind and waves at the seaside were too strong to collect data for safety. One of the subordinates said, "How about all the leaders come down to count together? Don't sit and issue notices all day long."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 6, Wenchang, Hainan. In the early morning of a stormy day, a sanitation worker was sweeping the street.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Shangqiu, Henan Province, Xingfu Wanjia Supermarket in Zhecheng County was rumored to be closing down. A large number of customers rushed into the supermarket to buy things, some even ate and drank, and the scene was in a mess. The supermarket's losses are still being calculated. Starting from September 6, it will suspend business for several days and resume business after stocking up enough goods.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 6 (Release) Dayong International Culture Development (Beijing) Co., Ltd. was punished by the Beijing Market Supervision Administration because its advertisements for studying in the United States included content such as "The Capitol is the seat of the U.S. legislature. Its magnificent architecture and exquisite interior decorations embody the solemnity and authority of the American democratic system."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: One blogger said, "You can write the copy as: Go to the United States to experience the decadence of capitalist society up close, and you shouldn't be punished for this."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a video released by Oriental Senior High School in Liaocheng, Shandong Province, sparked heated discussions. In the video, a student said, "I am the sanitation committee member. If I don't clean well, you will be punished. I am the red scarf administrator. Do you dare not wear a red scarf? I am the air conditioning administrator. I have the final say on whether the air conditioner is hot or cold."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens launched a poll on social media: Putting aside the 7 to 0 ratio, does the US have no responsibility at all? The poll results showed that 2,462 people chose "yes" and 411 chose "no".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 6, Zhejiang. A woman posted a video on a social platform saying that her mother was beaten by her father last year and suffered a second-degree minor injury. After her father was released from prison, he retaliated and threatened her mother. It was her sister who committed suicide by cutting her wrists that brought her a brief peace. After the video was released, the presiding judge called the woman and told her that he hoped she could delete the video as soon as possible, as the Cyberspace Administration of China had detected an abnormality in the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 1, Yancheng Yanfu Hospital issued a notice to organize all employees to carry out a unified donation activity, with the amount ranging from 50 yuan to 300 yuan. It also stated that all donations will be directly deducted from employees' wages. This has aroused doubts from citizens.
The person in charge of the hospital later stated that the donation was organized by the Health and Health Commission of Tinghu District. Because of the disturbance, it has now been changed to voluntary donations. The hospital will no longer forcibly deduct money, but will donate on behalf of the hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, Central News Agency reported: Taiwanese social activist Yang Chih-yuan was sentenced to nine years in prison and deprived of political rights for three years for the crime of "separatism". The case was heard in accordance with the law by the Wenzhou Intermediate People's Court on August 26 this year, and the first instance public verdict was announced.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 7, the internet celebrity "亚人" released a video saying that he was asked to give up his seat to a Japanese in Beijing's Old Summer Palace.
In the video, the Japanese translator wanted him to move to allow tourists to take a photo. But the internet celebrity said that he would never give up his seat to a Japanese. Then the two sides had a dispute.
During the period, a park security guard came and said after hearing the reason that the Japanese should not be allowed in because they "hate the devils" and expressed approval of the internet celebrity's behavior.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 4 (Release) Beijing. The bus station on Chang'an Avenue has installed long folding doors, which are operated by armed police and public security to control citizens from boarding the bus.
September 2, Beijing. Two security guards were sleeping soundly in the bridge tunnel. The photographer said, "What's the difference between this and putting two toys in the tunnel?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 7, the National Development and Reform Commission announced an emergency allocation of 200 million yuan from the central budget to support emergency recovery after the typhoon disaster in Hainan and Guangdong.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, NHK reported that Russian research institutions said they have no concerns about Japan's discharge of treated nuclear wastewater. On August 30, the Pacific Oceanographic Research Institute of the Russian Academy of Sciences announced the results of a study of seawater in the Pacific Ocean, the Sea of Okhotsk and the Sea of Japan, which found that each liter of seawater contained an average of about 0.12 becquerels of tritium, far below the safety standard. As for fish and shellfish caught in Japan, the agency said that these products are absolutely edible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 6 (Released) Dongguan, Guangdong. A man chased his wife with a knife on the roadside. The child stepped forward to stop his father and shouted "Mommy, go away!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 6 (Released) Panjin, Liaoning. A man smashed the window of the urban management law enforcement vehicle with a brick.
September 6 (Released) A couple was caught by the urban management while setting up a stall. The husband grabbed the urban management neck with one hand and said, "I have been to prison, I am afraid of you." The wife tried to dissuade him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 6, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. A delivery man in his 50s died suddenly in Xianlin Agile Community. According to insiders, he was the "order king" who ran hundreds of orders a day and only slept three or four hours a day. Someone found him lying on his electric bike in the afternoon and thought he was sleeping until dark.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In response to this, netizens replied: If hard work can make you rich, donkey would be the richest man in the world, and Xiangzi would think until his death that he was not working hard enough.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was reported on September 6 that a Chinese man tried to bribe an immigration officer with S$30 to allow him entry when entering Singapore, and was charged with bribery in court.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Xiangtan, Hunan, internet celebrity Li Weigang posted a video saying that he spent more than 20,000 yuan to rent a fish pond in Jinfeng Village. When they were fishing in the pond, many villagers rushed into the pond to grab the big fish. The village cadres responded: false information, he was trying to get traffic. Yesterday, Li Weigang posted a video to restore the incident and stated that the video had no script and that it was true that he helped fans to rent the fish pond and catch fish to pay for their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman posted a video saying that the village committee asked her family of seven to pay for cooperative medical insurance. She had originally planned to pay for only one person, but "the village committee said that the whole family must pay, 410 yuan per person, and if I don't pay, my minimum living allowance will be deducted."
